title: Biosample
comment: This object type is abstract. These properties are inherited by other object types

items.title: Alternate Accession
items.description: An accession previously assigned to an object that has been merged with this object.
items.comment: Only accessions of objects that have status equal replaced will work here.

biosample_ontology.title: Biosample ontology
biosample_ontology.description: An embedded property for linking to biosample type which describes the ontology of the biosample.

elasticsearch_mapping_index_type.title: Field mapping index type
elasticsearch_mapping_index_type.description: Defines one of three types of indexing available

derived_from.title: Derived from
derived_from.description: The donor(s) or sample(s) from which this object was directly derived.

derivation_process.title: Derivation process
derivation_process.description: The method(s) by which this object was derived.

items.title: Derivation process
items.description: A method by which this object was derived.

treatments.description: A list of treatments applied to the biosample.
treatments.comment: A list of treatments applied to the biosample, it is required to be non-empty if post_treatment_time or post_treatment_time_units are specified.

diseases.description: Known diseases of the specific sample

date_obtained.title: Date obtained
date_obtained.description: The date the biosample was taken, created, or bought.
date_obtained.comment: Date should be submitted in as YYYY-MM-DD.

starting_amount.title: Starting amount
starting_amount.description: The initial quantity of cells, tissue or animals obtained.

starting_amount_units.title: Starting amount units
starting_amount_units.description: The units used to quantify the amount of cells or tissue obtained.

post_treatment_time.title: Post-treatment time
post_treatment_time.description: The time that elapsed past the point when biosamples were treated.
post_treatment_time.comment: Use in conjunction with treatment and post_treatment_time_units to specify time elapsed post-treatment. post_treatment_time specification requires non-empty treatments list and post_treatment_time_units specification.

post_treatment_time_units.title: Post-treatment time units
post_treatment_time_units.description: The units of time that elapsed past the point when biosamples were treated.
post_treatment_time_units.comment: Use in conjunction with post_treatment_time and treatment to specify time elapsed post-treatment. post_treatment_time_units specification requires non-empty treatments list and post_treatment_time specification.

preservation_method.title: Preservation method
preservation_method.description: The method by which the sample was preserved: cryopreservation (slow-freeze) or flash-freezing.
preservation_method.comment: Indicate the sample preservation_method if known and may be/become an experimental variable to track.

preservation_time.title: Preservation time
preservation_time.description: The length of time that the sample was preserved

preservation_time_units.title: Preservation time units
preservation_time_units.description: The units of time that the sample was preserved
